'''Paint''' may refer to:

* A [[painting]].
* A [[dye]] or the action of dyeing something:
** [[Wool]], [[carpet]], [[bed]]s, and [[shulker box]]es can be dyed and redyed in a [[crafting]] grid.
** [[Terracotta]] and [[candle]]s can also be dyed crafting grid, but not redyed.
** [[Leather armor]], [[wolf armor]], or [[leather horse armor]] § [[Dye#Dyeing armor|dyeing armor]]
** A [[sheep]] § [[Dye#Dyeing sheep|dyeing sheep]]
** The collar of a tamed [[wolf]] or [[cat]] § [[Dye#Dyeing collars|dyeing collars]]
** The text on an un-waxed [[sign]] § [[Dye#Dyeing signs|dyeing signs]]
** The [[water]] inside a [[cauldron]] § [[Dye#Dyeing armor|dyeing]]
* The action of applying a [[Banner Pattern|pattern]] on a [[banner]].
* The action of applying an [[armor trim]] to a piece of armor.
* The act of placing blocks in an area to change the picture on a [[map]].
* The current [[resource pack]], [[Marketplace#Skin packs|skin pack]], [[Marketplace#Texture packs|texture pack]], or [[Marketplace#Mash-up packs|mash-up pack]] that a player is using.

Paint was also a [[Java Edition mentioned features|feature mentioned]] by [[Markus Persson]].
